topic.title: Some Self-Contradictory Problems
topic.body:
There’re some contradictions that need to be solved. If people use the site very frequently, the troubles of 50K or 100 K data limitation will come.  
If people don’t use the site frequently, then newcomers may think the site is too quiet. 
## **[50 K limit to be avoided! & code to enhance Browsing … ](http://127.0.0.1:43110/zybbs.bit/?Topic:6_1PUkWFbzkD4dyRZ2vH3G8WeQw4m2UVPA2p/a+Special+code+related+to+trackers)** 

To tackle the troubles, some sites give 1 MB data space to users, which will be enough to go for many months, or even many years for active users.  They’re mainly focused on serious topics.

1MB data space should be able to hold more than 100,000 words in pure Text format?
